quotes.quote: Be-YOU-tiful.
Self–worth is so vital to your happiness if you don't feel good about you, it's hard to feel good about anything else.
Being proud of yourself matters just as much, if not more than, external validation.
You wouldn't run a horse for 8, 9, 10 hours a day. Don't run yourself that way.
When you take care of yourself, you are giving yourself the charge needed to take on the day.
Self-discipline is the ultimate act of self-love.
Your journey is unique. Don't compare it with others.
Truly loving yourself can only happen when you are your own person.
Man cannot control himself unless he accepts himself.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Love is unconditional.
Focusing on your mental health is the kindest thing and healthiest thing you can do for yourself.
Happiness is internal, not external. And you can create it by loving yourself.
When it feels like you are lost, remember that all you need to do is love yourself to find yourself.
Follow your passions, not your partners. Do what feels right for your heart until you find the one who's right for your heart.
You empower yourself when you allow yourself to chase your dreams.
Loving yourself starts with liking yourself, which starts with respecting yourself, which starts with thinking of yourself in positive ways.
Only one thing can keep you down… Yourself.
You're not a chocolate chip cookie. Not everyone's going to love you.
Start to stop doing what you know to be wrong.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.quote: Never care about what they have to say about you.
Be the person you want to have in your life.
Having self-esteem is easy, obtaining self-respect is the real challenge.
The greatest gift you can give yourself is the courage to be greater than you are today.
Self-love is about honoring yourself every day.
The friends who talk to you about others are also talking to others about you.
You have to fall in love with yourself to be able to share that love with others.
Don't trade your authenticity for approval.
Be the person you know yourself to be.
Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Remember who you are and celebrate that person, no one can dim your light.
Love the awkwardness that makes you who you are.
If a person doesn't appreciate you, they don't deserve you.
You are worthier than you believe.
I'm a diamond, darling. You'll never break me, I'll just keep right on shining.
The world will give you many colors and brushes. You'll find your happiness when you use them to create your own unique masterpiece.
If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: You don't need someone to complete you. You never did and you never will. You are whole and complete just as you are.
Daring to set boundaries is about having the courage to love ourselves even when we risk disappointing others.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: People only treat you how they see you treating yourself.
The ability to respect others comes from the ability to respect yourself.
You are not here to make others understand you. You are here to understand yourself.
Sometimes you need to take a break from everyone and spend time alone, to experience, appreciate and love yourself.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Loving yourself doesn't mean you think you're perfect. It simply means accepting yourself, just as you are, today.
Others can choose whether or not to love you. The same goes for you loving yourself.
Accept yourself as you are. And that is the most difficult thing in the world, because it goes against your training, education, your culture.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Don't let someone change who you are, to become what they need.
Be true to who you are and those true to you will come.
It's easy to have a relationship with someone you love. Try to find relationships that help you love yourself, too.
Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others.
Loving yourself isn't vanity. It's sanity.
By being kind to ourselves, we become kind to others.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.quote: You, and only you, are ultimately responsible for who you become and how happy you are.
quotes.author: Rachel Hollis

quotes.quote: Your value isn't in your contributions, your productivity, or your results. Your value is in being a kind, compassionate human to yourself and others.
Let the appreciation you have for others spill onto you. You're worth it, too.
There's no need to fit in. Celebrate who you are with confidence and joy.
If you want to be successful, you will need to be your own cheerleader. You must push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
Surround yourself with people who treat you with kindness and respect.
Love yourself enough to take time for self-care.
Embrace self-love every day with Motivation app's uplifting love yourself quotes.
Start your journey towards inner strength and happiness by downloading the app here.
